Uses of Package
ojc.bain.base

  • Packages that use ojc.bain.base 
    Package Description
    ojc.bain
    Bain - a neural network simulator.
    ojc.bain.base
    Contains the base classes from which most of the components of a simulation are built on or extend from.
    ojc.bain.neuron
    Contains classes that implement neuron models.
    ojc.bain.synapse
    Contains classes that implement synapse models.
    ojc.bain.test
    Contains miscellaneous classes used for testing and analysis.
  • Classes in ojc.bain.base used by ojc.bain 
    Class and Description
    ComponentConfiguration
    A base class for all configuration objects for neural network elements (e.g.
    NeuronCollection
    Base class for all collections neurons.
    SynapseCollection
    Base class for all synapse collections.
  • Classes in ojc.bain.base used by ojc.bain.base 
    Class and Description
    ComponentCollection
    Base class for all collections of specific types of neural network components to be used in a Simulation.
    ComponentConfiguration
    A base class for all configuration objects for neural network elements (e.g.
    ComponentConfigurationListener
    Interface for classes that are to be notified of changes to a ComponentConfiguration.
    ConfigurableComponentCollection
    Base class for all collections of configurable neural network components.
